field.html: To use the +/- 10v scale you must set the jumper that corresponds to the 0-10v input on the MEGA-IND board.
Set the current output for the channel.

Set the current output for the channel.
To use the 0-10v inputs on this card you must first set the correct jumper position for the port.  If you do not have the correct position the input readings will be incorrect.
Set the current output for the channel.

inputs.name: relayState
inputs.instructions: <hr style="margin:1px"></hr>The incoming data should represent a boolean true/false or an object { state: boolean, latch:number }.  If a latch is supplied the relay will unlatch after the number of ms expires.

field.html: Enable each relay you are going to control or monitor state.  This Sequent I/O board can utilize up to 4 relays.<hr style="margin:2px"></hr>Only the relays you identify here will be available for triggers and feeds.
